participant_1.background:
I start my day with a fresh mango and stretching my long legs.
i am a mother of two beautiful boys.
I remember my father leaving when I was young, and my mother working long hours to support us.
I have turned my passion for juice into a business.
i love to go shopping and inspire myself in stylish stores.

participant_2.background:
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
I'm not sure, but I can hear the difference between a C and a G.
I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
I wake up early and stretch before getting ready for my day.
i love the game halo.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It is going great! I just got done spending some time with my boys. How about yours?
My day is going well, I got to hang out with my dog and play some video games.
That sounds like a great way to spend a day. I love video games, what games do you like to play?
I am a big fan of the Halo series, and I also enjoy playing games like Skyrim and The Sims.
I love Skyrim! I have spent way too much time playing that game.
Me too! I love building my own character and exploring the world.
It is so much fun to get lost in a good game.
It is! I love being able to escape reality for a little while.
Me too. I need to get back to playing, but it was nice to meet you!
It was nice to meet you too! I hope you have a great day.
